row.entry: This module allows enhancing local contrast. It uses the unnormalized bilateral filter, and works on the L channel from Lab.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Local contrast boosts details of your image, much like the equalizer does (see ). However, it is easier to use as it does not require you to work on different frequency bands.

sect5.title: coarseness
sect5.para: Make the details you want to adjust finer or coarser.

sect5.title: contrast
sect5.para: How strongly the algorithm distinguishes between brightness levels. Increasing the value results in a more contrasty look.

sect5.title: detail
sect5.para: Add or remove detail. Higher values will increase local contrast.

row.entry: After, a little overdone to demonstrate the effect. Use this sparingly, to avoid a cheap, overprocessed look.
